name: places/ChIJK8jWm_fzwokRXarFsd9r2ls
adrFormatAddress: 4879 Broadway, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: Nice people but their deli sandwiches are bad. I have been coming here for years through all the different owners. Such a shame because the sandwiches used to be so good but now they are just terrible. The quality of the ingredients is poor and the sandwich makers never listen to instructions. I say NO MAYO like four times and still, it comes with mayo, so after the last time I will never get a sandwich from here again. Good beer selection though, but I wouldn’t recommend getting any food that is prepared by someone

originalText.text:
Very nice, & respectful guys who work there. The pricing is pretty good as well. They made me a nice, & tasty BLT which was cool. Nice cat food for my baby's also.
Thanks.

originalText.text: Great Salad made to order and plenty of seating which is rare in most Deli's. Also they have a huge hot food bar that looked great. Plenty of good drink selection as well.

text.text: Great Salad made to order and plenty of seating which is rare in most Deli's. Also they have a huge hot food bar that looked great. Plenty of good drink selection as well.

originalText.text: These guys are awesome. And they have the redbull fridge fully stocked with different flavors.

text.text: These guys are awesome. And they have the redbull fridge fully stocked with different flavors.

originalText.text: Nice big store. This is like the only store around there. They do sandwiches never tried it. But it's big and they have lots of stuff u can buy. There's a yogurt shop right in the same block. There are buses that pass right there. You can take the a train a block down from this store.
